Grouped_Utterances: It’s been a bit of a mixed bag. Some days I feel really inspired, and others, it’s hard to get started. I think it’s mostly my mood. If I’m feeling a bit down or anxious about other things, it’s harder to focus on writing. Yes, actually. I had some unexpected expenses that threw me off a bit.  I’ve been using guided meditations, which help me focus. But sometimes my mind wanders, and I get frustrated. I guess I’m still thinking about those opportunities I mentioned last session. I keep wondering if I should have pursued them.
It feels calming. I like focusing on my breath. It definitely lifted my spirits. I felt more relaxed afterward.

Yeah, I’ve tried to be a bit more consistent with my writing. I set aside some time each day to work on my screenplays. Yes! I went for a walk by the beach last weekend. It was really nice to just be there and take in the scenery.

That’s wonderful to hear. Perhaps incorporating more walks or nature time could be beneficial for you. Would you be open to setting a goal for this week to spend time in nature? Yes, I’d like that! Maybe I can aim for at least two walks. Good! This week, perhaps you could write about those experiences and what you learned from them.  That sounds doable.
